data.lyric:
[ti:Faded (即刻电音版)]
[ar:Alan Walker/火箭少女101]
[al:Faded (即刻电音版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.30]Faded (即刻电音版) - Alan Walker/火箭少女101
[00:00.76]词：Alan Walker/Jesper Borgen/Anders Froen/Gunnar Greve/火箭少女 101
[00:01.22]曲：Alan Walker/Jesper Borgen/Anders Froen/Gunnar Greve
[00:01.52]段奥娟：
[00:35.10]You were the shadow to my light
[00:38.23]Did you feel us
[00:42.07]Another start
[00:43.87]You fade away
[00:45.13]孟美岐：
[00:45.84]Afraid our aim is out of sight
[00:48.92]Wanna see us
[00:52.64]Alive
[00:53.65]孟美岐/段奥娟：
[00:55.13]Where are you now
[01:00.82]Where are you now
[01:06.07]Where are you now
[01:07.25]段奥娟：
[01:08.55]Was it all in my fantasy
[01:10.76]孟美岐/段奥娟：
[01:11.43]Where are you now
[01:12.53]孟美岐：
[01:14.27]Were you only imaginary
[01:16.86]孟美岐/段奥娟：
[01:17.86]Where are you now
[01:22.56]I'm faded
[01:26.53]So lost I'm faded
[01:33.49]I'm faded
[01:37.23]So lost
[01:38.48]I'm faded
[01:40.82]段奥娟：
[01:53.99]I'm faded
[02:00.40]I'm faded
[02:06.85]I'm faded
[02:07.63]Yamy：
[02:17.74]What u looking for what u waiting for
[02:19.77]雨摇曳风铃 何处梦中情
[02:21.73]众里寻他千百度
[02:23.37]摆渡人在牵肠挂肚
[02:25.44]就像迷途的羔羊
[02:26.55]躲进虎穴般的盲目
[02:28.18]寻找 所爱它在哪
[02:29.93]软肋和盔甲
[02:31.34]等你教我放下
[02:33.40]说不清的执念让我更加害怕
[02:35.89]我害怕大海跟着潮水一起退去
[02:38.15]我害怕森林跟着雪山一起委屈
[02:40.58]我害怕炙热的心放久了成悲剧
[02:43.05]我害怕世界末日来不及把你追寻
[02:45.24]别让我褪色在到达伊甸园之前
[02:47.47]调整配色 快调整你的视线
[02:49.30]我每时每刻每分每秒
[02:50.36]穿越过去和未来
[02:51.45]能否帮我点燃火炬和尘埃
[02:53.24]what what u waiting for huh
[02:54.62]注定你和我 就像飞蛾扑火
[02:56.09]孟美岐/段奥娟：
[02:56.32]Where are you now
[02:58.26]Atlantis
[02:59.50]Under the sea
[03:01.31]Under the sea
[03:03.39]Where are you now
[03:05.20]Another dream
[03:07.60]The monsters running wild inside of me
[03:10.45]I'm faded
[03:14.42]I'm faded
[03:17.16]So lost I'm faded
[03:21.97]I'm faded
[03:24.90]So lost I'm faded
